<< libpointer dynamic link Supported C/C++ compilers >>

libpointer_delete

Removes libpointer object.

Syntax

libpointer_delete(h)
delete(h)

Input argument

h

a handle: an libpointer object.

Description

delete(h) releases libpointer object.

Do not forget to clear h afterward.

Example

libpointer_used(),delete(libpointer_used())

See also

libpointer.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
